title: Wait timers and loss of promos/demoted due to game crashes
body:
So, the past couple of days I have been playing ranked, and have had troubles with client crashes.

Case 1:
Client crashes 3 times in a row while in champ select, leading to a 5 min wait time, and then a 30 min wait time(before i get put in queue). So, I wait it out and get into a match finally. THEN, whenever I get to the loading screen for the match, IT CRASHES AGAIN. I get back in right after 3 mins and then the game has been set as a "remake" the second i get in. SOMEHOW this led to me getting a demotion in my rank, and on top of that I got 5 different times where i had to wait 10 mins to get into queue (really annoying).

Case 2:
I finally get out of the 5 wait times and are queueing up for another match. At this point I am back in promos to get back to where I was. I get into champ select for about 1 min, and BOOM. THE CLIENT CRASHES AGAIN LEADING TO A DODGE AND A LOSS IN MY PROMO GAME.
On top of that, I now have a 30 min wait before i can play another match (which I am spending some of that time typing this).

Can someone do anything about this? I've spent about 1 1/2 hours waiting, got a demotion, and have lost a promo game due to this issue.
I don't think it's my PC, because it's never had crash issues before. This is really ruining the game for me.
Thanks for reading.

replies.body: If your issue persists after the provided troubleshoot steps, please reach out to our tech team by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  I recommend gathering a set of logs via the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), which can help determine what might be going wrong.

UPDATE; Got on today to play a ranked game, and halfway through THE CLIENT CRASHES. I finish my game (my team wins), and i STILL GET A priority queue for 20 mins before the next 5 game. 

THIS IS 100 MINS OF WAITING THAT ISN'T MY FAULT. CAN SOMEONE FIX EITHER THIS BUG, or my account wait time??????? PLEASEEEEEEEEEEEE

Client crashes during champion select are typically caused by a poor connection to the servers, especially if it's an intermittent issue. A disconnection negatively affects everyone in the match, regardless if the disconnection was intentional or not. This is a reason why disconnections are treated equally by the system and penalties cannot be modified or removed.

I recommend working through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), which addresses the most common solutions for this issue.
It's not connection. My internet has always been fine, and i've never had problems with this before. It's the update 6.14. I'm certain it is.

Rid yourself of the pests which harass your gameplay by using the [Bug & Crash Exterminator.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Kha’Zix and Elise won’t know what hit ‘em.

Anything I can do/Anyone else having this problem?
